and here we go racing around .
output.sentences: First thing we saw at the race was the stock car that was sponsored by our organization.
All the cars were lined up before the race.
The drivers took a lot of pride and joy in the organization they represented.
The primary focus was the photo op for the owner of the company.
Once all the photo ops ended it was time for the racing to begin.
